mapper.select:
select SUM(tmpcount) from ( select count(t1.id) AS tmpcount from project_application t1 where is_delete='0' and status!='0' AND Id IN (SELECT DISTINCT relateddomain_id FROM t_workflowstep WHERE 1=1 AND actionuser_id= #{ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and project_code like "%" #{projectCode} "%"
and project_name like "%" #{projectName} "%"
and project_type like "%" #{projectType} "%"
and organization like "%" #{organization} "%"
and leval like "%" #{leval} "%"
and project_manager like "%" #{projectManager} "%"
UNION ALL select count(t2.id) as tmpcount from project_application t2 where is_delete='0' and status='0' and creater=#{ownerId}
and project_code like "%" #{projectCode} "%"
and project_name like "%" #{projectName} "%"
and project_type like "%" #{projectType} "%"
and organization like "%" #{organization} "%"
and leval like "%" #{leval} "%"
and project_manager like "%" #{projectManager} "%" ) A

select * from project_application where is_delete='0' and status!='0' AND Id IN (SELECT DISTINCT relateddomain_id FROM t_workflowstep WHERE 1=1 AND actionuser_id= #{ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and project_code like "%" #{projectCode} "%"
and project_name like "%" #{projectName} "%"
and project_type like "%" #{projectType} "%"
and organization = #{organization}
and leval like "%" #{leval} "%"
and project_manager = #{projectManager}
UNION ALL select * from project_application where is_delete='0' and status='0' and creater=#{ownerId}
and project_code like "%" #{projectCode} "%"
and project_name like "%" #{projectName} "%"
and project_type like "%" #{projectType} "%"
and organization like "%" #{organization} "%"
and leval like "%" #{leval} "%"
and project_manager like "%" #{projectManager} "%"
order by create_time desc
mapper.update: update project_application set is_delete='1' where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from project_application where is_delete="0" and DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y')=#{niandu} and project_code is not null
mapper.update: update project_application set status='9' where id=#{id}
